data.eml:eml: A new Chorizococcus species (Coccoidea, Pseudococcidae) from Taiwan with transferring of Chorizococcus mirzayansi Moghaddam to genus Spilococcus Ferris

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tsai, Ming-Yu, Wu, Wen-Jer (2011): A new Chorizococcus species (Coccoidea, Pseudococcidae) from Taiwan with transferring of Chorizococcus mirzayansi Moghaddam to genus Spilococcus Ferris. ZooKeys 103: 27-40, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.103.1215, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.103.1215
